name: Dragonite

passive.name: Delivery Service
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may pick a Prize Card. If it is face-down, reveal it. Either way, you may swap it with a card in your hand. If you do, reveal that card permanently.

attacks.name: Rainbow Flurry
attacks.effect: Discard as many energies as you like attached to this Pokemon. For each different type of Energy discarded, this attack does 20 damage.

flavor: These Pokemon can fend for themselves. Remote islands use them to ferry mail to and from distant lands.
